name: Find The One
description:
One Level. One Mechanic. One Enemy. One Life

Try to survive the wave of clones while trying to figure out which one is the real one.  You can only move by teleportation to where you strike your weapon.

If you kill a clone, they will multiply into two. Kill the real one and all clones will die. If you get hit by an enemy you die in a single hit.

The only way to win is to hit the real one! Have fun.
